name: Demon Plane
description:
The villagers have been digging too deep and woke the Demons of Doom. Only Demon Plane can stop the forces of evil from destroying the village.

Collect water and shoot or drop it onto the demons to stop them. Save pigs to earn extra skills.

The game was designed for game-pad - please use one.

(You can still use Mosue&Keyboard, but the plane controls were designed for analogue stick)

Demon Plane is our 3rd game since the beginning of August. We now even have an actual artist.

Hurray us!

We are happy about any feedback - would be awesome if you'd left us a comment or wrote us on twitter @stupidmindlessf
